==Japanese==

===Etymology 1===
{{ja-kanjitab|しゃく|いち|yomi=o}}
Compound of {{compound|尺|tr1=shaku|t1=shaku|一|tr2=ichi|t2=one|lang=ja|sort=しゃくいち}}.

====Pronunciation====
{{ja-pron|yomi=goon|しゃくいち|acc=0|acc_ref=DJR}}

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|しゃくいち}}

# one [[shaku]] and one [[sun]]

===Etymology 2===
{{ja-kanjitab|せき|いつ|yomi=o}}
From {{etyl|ltc|ja|sort=せきいつ}} compound {{m|zh|尺一|tr=tsyhek ʔjit|lit=foot (measure) + one}}.

====Pronunciation====
{{ja-pron|yomi=kanon|せき.いつ|acc=0|acc_ref=DJR}}

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|せき.いつ}}

# in [[ancient]] [[China]], the [[paperboard]] on which the [[imperial]] [[decree]] was written, or the [[imperial]] [[decree]]
